meanings.definition: A person who has an extremely large amount of wealth.
meanings.sent1: The zillionaires in the city own many tall buildings.
meanings.sent2: The zillionaires donated a lot of money to charity.
meanings.sent3: The zillionaires had so much money, they used dollar bills as wallpaper.
meanings.sent4: Among the regular folks, the zillionaires seemed like mythical creatures.
meanings.sent5: The zillionaires lived in luxurious mansions with golden gates.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals who possess an immense fortune.
meanings.sent1: At the gala, the zillionaires arrived in fancy cars.
meanings.sent2: The zillionaires invested wisely and grew their wealth.
meanings.sent3: The zillionaires' yacht was so big, it had its own swimming pool.
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, the zillionaires were the ultimate goal.
meanings.sent5: The zillionaires' parties were extravagant and unforgettable.
